title: Horrible Champs that need fixing
body: What in the hell is going on at riot its a joke im sick of playing this shit day in day out trying to climb but i cant daruis is broken signed is broken nasus is broken these champs that you make and dont update is a joke you need to change nasus so he cant go 0/8 in lane then either farm all game and 1v5 or force one of your team to stop him farming its a freaking joke im sick of shredding singed in lane making him 0/8 and he gets a freaking banner gets NO DAMAGE and yet he cant 1v3 at 20 mins in its a joke fix this freaking game we are all sick of this crap daruis is insane his cooldowns are way to low his damage is way to high change it, nerf singed nerf nasus, change these play styles of get wrecked in lane then win because the champion is a joke daruis is banned every game TAKE A HINT HE IS OVER POWERED im glad you are finally removing banner but holy crap HOT FIX IT and another thing is this match making system why in the hell am i getting matched with plats when im gold and they are worse then my entire team im sick of winning my lane and bot lane has fed 0/8 dont match people with people who dont understand the game fix this game man im sorrry im so mad its just i cant say any of this shit in game bcasue the second i say anything remotely negative i get chat banned its all horrible at the moment please fix it or at least give me some insight on what in the hell is going on at riot games thinking this crap is ok its like you guys are only focusing on LCS or pro play not recognizing the horrendous solo que honestly guys please tell me when you are going to nerf daruis ive been waiting YEARS AND ALL YOU HAVE DONE IS BUFF HIM please please tell me you guys play this game sorry if this seems like a rant but i am just sick and tired of giving my all and it dosent matter because a signed can just 1v3 becasue he has insane amount of damage while building tank, all these tank champs that can deal more damage then a bruiser is insane fix it i shouldnt be vsing a shen as irelia and he builds full tank and he STILL deals way more damage then me it should be i deal nothing to him he deals nothing to me but its not its just i deal fuck all to him and she deals half my hp please give me some insight on what is planned for the future because we as a whole are sick of this crap renekton as well what the hell is going on with him, he got a buff sort of recently like WHAT there is nothing you can do against him in lane once he hits lvl 2 he can win almost any match up, fiora needs to be changed she should not be able to parry ANY DAMAGE at least it should have it and only fully parry stuns or slows like come on all these champs that hard counter are a joke please please tell me what you guys have planned to fix this massive mess that is solo que at the moment also on top of that you have the most stupidest idea for a champ, jhin he is so broken as well constantly getting move speed like what the frick is that man and being able to get over 1000 ad is just a joke he can one shot no matter how tanky you are im sick of it losing to game mechanics rather than losing to the opposing teams skill level anyone can play broken champ and go against Pros and win with just the fact that the champ is broken, and then there is hit boxs which is why i also dont think you guys play this game just google ashe R hit box its insane or better yet all of brand skill shots are WAY bigger then they appear or even sions charge up and his minon throw thing all of these are just the beggining of a horrible experience for anyone playing this game please please FIX THE HIT BOXS AND OVER POWERED CHAMPS before you make new items and stuff honestly im trying to keep my anger down becasue i dont want to be insulting its just do you guys honestly think you have made this game balanced if you need help with the problems and how to fix them, hire a player not some game designer or whatever you have atm becasue its not working grab players from bronze silver gold plat diamond master challenger and ask them what is broken what champs need fixing with the hit boxes and if you try and say you do do that shit its wrong because within one week daruis would be banned teemos blind would become a skill shot like all of these things you need to fix before trying to make new champs and items, i was looking for somewhere to complain and all i can find is these tickets i know me saying all these means nothing since you obviously dont care about your fan base but still WE ALL WANT TO BE HEARD and trynd fix him he is a JOKE 5 SECONDS OF NOT BEING ABLE TO DIE AND HE CAN USE IT THOURHG ANY CC Like why are you making new champs and items WHEN YOU HAVENT FIXED YOUR FREAKING HIT BOXES JUST PLAY A GAME VERSING BRAND ITS A JOKE
